About Us

Led by President Bo Reahard, S&R Technology Group assists businesses in leveraging computer technology to achieve their objectives. Mr. Reahard emphasizes, "We design and develop a single website that addresses not only the Internet needs of the organization but also their Extranet and Intranet requirements." This integrated approach allows a common database of information to be shared across all corporate audiences, with proprietary information safeguarded through a comprehensive directory services strategy.

Services About Us
Technology Partners
Chief Information Office

Does your company have a CIO?

You probably have a CEO and a CFO and perhaps a COO but do you have a Chief Information Office? The role of a CIO for a company is no less important than the roles played by the other Cxx's in the organization. For large companies, a CIO is a full time job for a senior level administrator who has a technology background. For small and medium sized companies, the role of the CIO need not be a full time position and that is where S&R Technology Group can help.

Keep reading
What we have to offer

Our Services

S & R Technology Group has developed a methodology to enhance business results through the intelligent use of Internet technologies. This approach is built on five key elements that ensure a solid and secure data infrastructure.

Total Information System

Before launching an Internet site, a company must assess its total information system (TIS) to develop a web-based strategy. This ensures easy information sharing and considers Internet, Extranet, and Intranet implications.

End User Publication

Web content publication should be managed by the authors and publishers responsible for the information. Procedures should enable them to easily publish content in a web format for various audiences.

Data Driven Web Sites

Websites should use data-driven pages instead of static ones, allowing quick updates that reflect business changes. This makes content management easier for authors and publishers.

Web Based Directory Services

Directory services are essential for controlling access to a website and its TIS, providing security and personalization to make the site more useful for different users.

Respect People System

Directory services require a back-end system to validate user profiles and keep information accurate. This helps websites provide timely and personalized content, while respecting users by correctly handling their personal data.

Learn more about our services:
I-Net Strategy

A well-structured I-Net ensures seamless communication across an organization. By integrating Internet, Extranet, and Intranet components, businesses can enhance collaboration, streamline workflows, and maintain information consistency.

I-Net Strategy
I-Net Solutions

Optimize Communication with
I-Net Technology

S&R Technology Group provides I-Net solutions to help businesses leverage Internet, Intranet, and Extranet technologies for seamless communication and information sharing. Our expertise ensures efficient, secure, and cost-effective content distribution.

  • Decentralized publishing: Enable individual business units to manage and share content effortlessly, eliminating traditional distribution challenges.

  • Instant access: I-Net servers ensure authorized users can retrieve up-to-date documents anytime, streamlining collaboration and workflow efficiency.

Learn more
Enterprise IT Solutions

Scalable & Secure IT Infrastructure for Your Business

At S&R Technology Group, we design, implement, and manage robust IT infrastructures that enhance business productivity and security. Our solutions streamline communication, improve data management, and ensure seamless integration with existing enterprise systems.

  • Comprehensive IT strategy: Tailored technology solutions that align with your business goals.

  • Reliable support: 24/7 system monitoring, proactive maintenance, and responsive IT support to keep your business running smoothly.
